transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji madam.
Customer: Sir free ho gaye na aap?
Executive: Haan haan main free hoon. Okay.
Customer: Main aapko na link share kar rahi hoon sir video meeting ka link share karungi usse aapko zyada acche se samajh mein aayega phone se join kar lenge na phone hoga aapke paas?
Executive: Mere mere system pe system pe.
Customer: Haan aapko main link share kar rahi hoon ek minute dijiye bas isi number pe kar rahi hoon aapko.
Executive: Theek hai madam okay.
Customer: Sir aapka ye number ye wala hai na seven
Executive: 7726962213
Customer: 85 wala Sahil sir ka hai na?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Okay aapka 7726962213 hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan ye dekhiye maine aapko link bheja.
Customer: Aap na revert kariyega reply kariyega fir nahi to aapko wo link active nahi show hoga.
Executive: Main isko mobile mein join karu ya?
Customer: Haan mobile se kar lijiye agar system hai computer hai paas mein.
Executive: Computer se isko apne ispe kar leta hoon main ek minute.
Customer: To fir kar lijiye sir agar computer hai to.
Executive: Ek minute ye loading ho raha hai isme.
Customer: Hmm.
(silence)
Automated message: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line
Customer: Join karo.
Customer: Hello sir abhi join kariye aap maine fir se aapko link ho gaya ek minute.
(silence)
Customer: Okay sir aapka naam Ibrahim hai?
Executive: Mera Sahil.
Customer: Okay okay.
Customer: Ab main na screen aap screen share karenge sir agar IndiaMART login kiya hua aapne?
Executive: Isme login kar raha hoon main ek minute OTP leta hoon. Haan kariye kariye main wait kar rahi hoon.
(silence)
Automated message: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Haan ji hello.
Executive: Ji sir aapne login kar liya seller account mein?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Theek hai ab na main aapko bata rahi hoon jaise waha pe aapko show ho raha hoga ek mic ki button aa rahi hai aur video what button hai usi ke just option hai uske bagal mein aapko ek box mein arrow show kar raha hoga smiley ke just left hand side pe to aapko usi se hi click karna hai aur usme share screen aayega to usme entire screen aap select karna chrome tab mein mat karna.
Executive: Hmm hmm entire ye IndiaMART share screen kiya hai Microsoft window entire screen kar dega. Haan share screen.
Customer: Entire screen kariye ab usme select kar lijiye screen aur fir share kariye.
Executive: Ho gaya sir? Haan ho gayi haan ho gayi ab aap na apna IndiaMART open kariye isko got it pe select kar dijiye chaliye show ho gaya ab sir aap mujhe ye pehle to ye bataiye use kaun karta hai Sahil sir karte hain ya fir aap karte hain?
Executive: Wo bhi karta hai main bhi karta hoon dono hi karte hain. Okay.
Customer: To mobile mein aapne app download kari hogi apne IndiaMART. Haan mobile mein to hai mere. Theek hai to ab isme na sabse pehle to main aapko jaise aapka rehta hai thing cheeze aapne apni catalog check kari hai kaisi design hui hai IndiaMART pe?
Executive: Main madam abhi kuch bhi nahi check kiya. Main aapko batati hoon profile pe jaaiye dashboard se niche ek option aa raha hai profile option. Profile. Haan click kariye ispe ab yaha pe ek aa raha hai option ye website pages ke just bagal mein share catalog ka.
Executive: Share catalog. Haan haan ispe click kariye. Ispe click karu?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ab yaha pe na aapko ek URL dikh raha hai www.indiamart.com Sahil India Sonex Rajasthan ispe click kariye to ye aapki catalog bani hai IndiaMART pe jo ki har ek buyer check karta hai aapko inquiries aati hongi abhi aapne dekha hoga inquiries calls aur aap buyleads ke bhi notification aate honge to ye aapka catalog bana hai agar aap jaise
Customer: Haan isko click karo.
Customer: Aap product and service pe click kariye.
Executive: Kis mein?
Customer: Product and services pe click kariye.
(silence)
Customer: Ye aapke sare products hain jaise aapka sabse pehle aapka jo product show ho raha tha shayad se stone tha ye marble dali hai isko download nahi karna hai aapko ye matlab kya hota hai na buyer jab bhi aata hai wo visit karta hai aapki catalog ko view karta hai to ye sare products aapke waha pe show hote hain usko.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Isko agar aap back karo ek baar isko ispe jaau wapas se ek minute. Haan back kariye ab yaha pe na aap ye ye option hata dijiye niche cursor le aaiye apna mobile laptop mouse cursor niche haan sabse ek baar niche scroll kariye ek baar open kariye fir se catalog open kariye aapne. Okay theek hai haan ab yaha pe ek baar upar ekdam upar scroll kariye sir ki taraf aapko ye dekhna hai ki sabse pehle aapka product kaun sa dikhta hai aap sabse isse aapke sare product wall panel mein theek hai ye aapka top pe dikh raha hai to wall panel aap zyada deal karte ho wall panels mein?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai to ye main hota hai ki aap jis bhi product mein sabse zyada deal karte ho wo aapka top pe show hota hai ya fir agar aapko kisi koi bhi product hai usko top pe show karna hai aap usme zyada deal karna chahte ho usme aapko zyada calls aur inquiries chahiye to uske liye aapko us product mein aur changes karne hote hain aur plus usme buyleads ho gayi calls inquiries ka matlab acche se follow up karna hota hai to wo aapka top pe aata hai pehli cheez to ye aapka catalog hai. Isme ye kaise likha hua hai madam prominent and leading from Makrana you offer 04 CNC.
Executive: Sir ye na aapka prominent leading from Makrana ye offer ye aapke about us mein shayad mention hai ek baar IndiaMART pe click kariye apne tab pe welcome to seller India. Ye number kaise aa raha hai ye samajh mein nahi aaya. Marble 01 ye aapke product ka name hoga wahi main aapko welcome to seller India. Nahi ye sab mein hi aa raha hai marble 04 CNC wall panel marble 10 CNC ye kya hai. Ye usi isi cheez ko bata rahi hoon wall panel pehle aap char white marble kibla ye aisa kyu aa raha hai isme to pura koi sahi nahi hai. Ye aapka product ka naam aa raha hai to aapko agar isko sahi karna hai ye sab mein galat likhe hue hain aapke ye sab mein galat likhe hue hain abhi jaise 3.5 feet marble 4.5 feet marble 4 feet marble pedestal wash basin 4 feet ka thodi aata hai aap pehle na apna seller account open kariye seller account open kariye ye jo welcome to seller India ab yaha pe aaiye products mein products mein click kariye buyleads se niche hota hai haan products ab yaha pe aapka ye product hai dekhiye product name mein hi galat likha hua hai ye jo pencil button aa rahi hai ispe click kariye aap haan pencil button aa rahi hai product name ke just bagal mein to yaha pe hum remove kar denge to wo hat jayega aapka. Marble CNC wall ab save pe click kare aap. Save ye kya le aaya. Aapko isiliye to main call kar rahi thi sir kitne dino se aap bahut busy the ki ye sari cheeze check kar lijiye. Main thoda busy tha isiliye. Hmm iska change ho gaya Makrana white marble. Haan ho gaya ho gaya ho gaya. Aise hi aap na khud se aap apne sare product ka jo bhi detail aapko change karna hai name change karna hai uska specification aapko lag raha hai ki galat hai dekhiye isme thickness hi 4.5 millimeter padi hui hai is wajah se waha pe bhi name mein bhi product mein aa gaya to ye cheeze hain jo aap khud se bhi kar sakte ho 68 product hain aapke catalog mein to agar aapko aur bhi product hain jinme aap deal karte ho aapko add karna hai to aap khud se kar sakte ho add product mein jaake agar is particular product ka hi detail kuch galat hai to usko aap khud se change kar sakte ho apna khud se kar sakte ho aap to waha pe aapka jo actual mein jo catalog show hota hai buyer ka waha pe bhi update ho jayega. Hmm ye hai aapka products ka theek hai ye aap samajh gaye na aapko kaise karna hai ye main hota hai to ye ab aap jaise aap free rehte ho to aap khud se check usko sahi kar sakte ho ab aap buyleads pe click karo. Hmm ab yaha pe na proper aapka jaise 16 India likha hua hai agar aap right hand side bottom mein dekhenge 16 India balance. Hmm kaha pe? Yaha pe click kariye pehle aap 16 India. 16 India buylead balance dikh raha hai wo. Haan haan ispe click kariye. Click karo? Haan. To yaha pe ab aap dekhiye ye aapke number of buyleads hain jo aapko weekly allocate hote hain nine aapko weekly milte hain matlab 10 milte hain week ke jo ki abhi aapne ek consume kar liya aur daily bonus bhi aapne aaj consume kiya hai ye aapka buylead balance hai ab yaha pe jitne bhi requirement aa rahe hain na marble flooring service jo aapne category mark kari hai wo buylead aapko consume karni hai har din aapko do ya teen buylead consume karni hai aur turant buyer se baat karni hai recent buylead to usme aapko zyada conversion milega ye ek aapke liye plus point hai zyada conversion milega to ye buyleads hai aur plus lead manager aapne apne lead manager mein inquiries pe bhi follow up kiya hai na sir? Haan inquiries se. Haan to yaha pe aapki jo catalog abhi humne dekhi thi direct buyer waha pe aap marble fantasy pe click kariye jo inquiry aayi hai aaj aapko white marble flower pot ki 1 November ko jo aayi thi. Okay ispe click kariye ab ye jaise hai ye aayi thi aapke paas agar aap inko supply kar sakte ho Rajasthan se hain ye shayad ye to khali aise dekhne ke liye kar dete hain inquiry sab Makrana wagera se. Accha fir bhi aap na ispe reply kar diya kariye is inquiry pe aapko reply karna zaruri hai aapki activity status ke liye ki kabhi bhi koi buyer search kare to company top pe dikhe ye zaruri hota hai baki kar nahi rahe hain agar aapko lag raha hai ki relevant hai to aap ispe call kariye aapko aisa karna hai but agar ek baar ye aap kar lenge call to wo aapke liye hi helpful rahega kya pata genuine requirement ho aapke upar hai but ye jo maine aapko cheez batai na buylead aur lead manager ye aapka hota hai main ye karna hai ab aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye aapka jaise location hai sir Sahil India Sonex ka aapka Makrana ki location hai to aur aap is business mein abhi kitna time ho gaya aapko aapne abhi shuru kiya hai ya ki pehle se aapne
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to understand IndiaMART catalog design.

- Wants to correct product details in catalog.

- Needs guidance on using buyleads and lead manager.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a video meeting link.

- Executive guided on screen sharing and navigation.

- Executive explained catalog design and product details.

- Executive explained how to correct product details.

- Executive explained buyleads and lead manager usage.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, buyleads, lead manager, product details
